sentences.en: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.cn: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.en: A spell of poor health took the edge off her performance.
sentences.cn: 一度身体欠佳令她表现有失水准。

sentences.en: an area where poor people lived
sentences.cn: 穷人居住区

sentences.en: An entire poor section of town was bombed into oblivion.
sentences.cn: 城市的一整片贫民区被炸为了平地。

sentences.en: Bulman was cursed with a poor memory for names.
sentences.cn: 布尔曼总是记不住人名。

sentences.en: Conditions for the poor in Los Angeles have not improved.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶穷人的境况仍未得到改善。

sentences.en: corduroy has always been the poor man's velvet.
sentences.cn: 灯芯绒一直是天鹅绒的便宜替代品。

sentences.en: Food for the ordinary Soviet troops and NCOs was very poor.
sentences.cn: 苏联普通士兵的伙食很糟糕。

sentences.en: for many years radio has been the poor relation of the media.
sentences.cn: 多年来收音机一直是媒体中微不足道的一种形式。

sentences.en: He blames himself for the team’s poor performance .
sentences.cn: 他因球队的不佳表现而自责。

sentences.en: He's fastening on that poor girl like a leech.
sentences.cn: 他像蚂蟥一样缠着那个可怜的姑娘。

sentences.en: Her family were so poor they couldn’t afford to buy her new clothes.
sentences.cn: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.en: His moodiness may have been caused by his poor health.
sentences.cn: 他的喜怒无常可能是身体欠佳所致。

sentences.en: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.cn: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.en: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.cn: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.en: Poor Jane was in rather a spin about the party.
sentences.cn: 可怜的简对这次聚会真有些不知所措。

sentences.en: Poor kid, he’s had a rough day.
sentences.cn: 可怜的孩子，今天他真倒霉。

sentences.en: poor rates of pay
sentences.cn: 很低的薪酬

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentences.en: Rose was a poor cook and a worse mother.
sentences.cn: 罗丝不太会做饭，更不会当母亲。

sentences.en: Rust and flaking paint mean the metalwork is in poor condition.
sentences.cn: 生锈和掉漆说明金属配件损毁严重。

sentences.en: She has a poor complexion and pock marks on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她满面菜色，额头上有些麻子。

sentences.en: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.cn: 该国自然资源匮乏。

sentences.en: The second-hand version is a poor copy of the original.
sentences.cn: 盗版版本是对原版的低劣复制。

sentences.en: The soil in this area is very poor.
sentences.cn: 这一地区土壤很贫瘠。

sentences.en: The worst part of the set-up is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.cn: 安装时最糟糕就是操作指南讲述不够清楚。

sentences.en: Watercolour still seems somehow to be the poor relation of oil painting.
sentences.cn: 水彩画似乎仍比油画略逊一筹。

sentences.en: You poor thing , you’ve had a hard time of it, haven’t you?
sentences.cn: 可怜的东西，你过得很苦，是不是？
